data.title: Roger Brushless BE20 210 Twin Gate Motor wrought Iron Gates
data.desc: A BE20 210 motor kit installed perfectly on a twin 2m wroughtt iron gate.

data.title: Roger Brushless BE20 210 Twin Gate Motor wrought Iron Gates (2)
data.desc: A close up on the BE20 210 motor mounted on a metal pillar using its weld on brackets.

data.title: Roger Brushless BE20 210 Twin Gate Motor Wooden Gates
data.desc: A stunning example of the BE20 210 used on a pair of wooden gates.

data.title: Roger Brushless BE20 210 Twin Gate Motor Wooden Gates (2)
data.desc: The BE20 210 demonstrating how to perfectly automate a twin garden gate.

data.title: Roger Brushless BE20 210 Twin Gate Motor Wooden Gates (3)
data.desc: A close up on the BE20 210 motor mounted on a wooden pillar using the adjustable bracket set developed by The Electric Gate Shop.

data.title: Roger Brushless BE20 210 Twin Gate Motor Wooden Gates (4)
data.desc: An action shot of the BE20 210 gate kit set up with the photocells & posts to avoid any chance of damage to a vehicle.

data.title: Roger Brushless BH23 284 Articulated Gate Motor
data.desc: The BH23 284 is the perfect motor for those gates with larger pillars that instantly create a restriction for conventional motors.

data.title: Roger Brushless BH23 284 Articulated Gate Motor (2)
data.desc: The BH23 284 motor arms can reach around up to 250mm from the centre of the pillar.

data.title: Roger Brushless BH23 284 Articulated Gate Motor (3)
data.desc: BH23 284 pulls the gate open with its extension arms from the back of the pillar.

data.title: Roger Brushless BH23 284 Articulated Gate Motor (4)
data.desc: A great shot of the BH23 284 working with the photocells & posts to avoid any potential damage to a vehicle.

data.title: Roger Brushless BH23 284 Articulated Gate Motor (5)
data.desc: The BH23 284 demonstrating its pedestrian open setting that's standard with any Roger Brushless motor.

data.title: Roger Brushless BH30 803 Sliding Gate Motor
data.desc: The 1000kg BH30 803 sliding gate kit featuring the latest brushless motor on a wroughtt iron sliding gate.

data.title: Roger Brushless BH30 803 Sliding Gate Motor (2)
data.desc: The complete BH30 803 sliding gate set up including Brushless gate kit & all the floor track to enable the gate to slide seamlessly.

data.title: Roger Brushless BH30 803 Sliding Gate Motor (3)
data.desc: The BH30 803 cantilever sliding gate kit can operate large sliding gates up to 1000kg.

data.title: Roger Brushless BR21 362 Underground Gate Motor
data.desc: BR21 362 underground used to automate a pair of large steel gates.

data.title: Roger Brushless BR21 362 Underground Gate Motor (2)
data.desc: The BR21 362 motor kit making use of the little space available for a gate motor coupled with the correct positioning of the safety edges.

data.title: Roger Brushless BR21 362 Underground Gate Motor (3)
data.desc: A close up of the BR21 362 motor with heavy duty foundation box capable of opening a 4m gate.
